Key Match Events: A foul was called on Giannis Antetokounmpo in the closing seconds, resulting in game-winning free throws by LaMelo Ball
The call was later noted in the NBA's last-two-minute report, which deemed the call incorrect
Post-Match Reflections: Milwaukee Bucks head coach Doc Rivers expressed his disappointment to reporters after the loss
Rivers stated that LaMelo Ball fell and slipped on his own, and that the call was incorrect
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bucks hope to avoid another game decided by incorrect foul calls as they prepare to face the Houston Rockets on Monday
The Bucks' loss to the Hornets was their second consecutive game decided by a questionable foul call
Others: Doc Rivers was fined $25,000 by the NBA for criticizing referees in the loss to the Hornets
